attributes.action: Make public transport on buses and trains free for NHS workers & volunteers
attributes.additional_details:
Please make public transport on buses, tubes and trains free to enable more staff to come into work and help those in need.

Making public transport free will:

- help staff who are looking after their unemployed family during this difficult time.
- help staff that have retired to return to hospitals.
- help staff to afford temporary housing to avoid spreading the virus to vulnerable family members
- allow volunteers to help the NHS without having to worry about travel costs
attributes.background: Us NHS workers are risking our lives everyday in this war against the infamous Covid-19 Coronavirus. Whether we are front line staff or running outpatient clinics, we are choosing to come in to work to save lives because we care.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305801

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
